info.name: TMDB API v3 Collection
info.description: A complete Postman collection for all The Movie Database (TMDB) API v3 endpoints to access movie, TV show, actor, and related data. Requires an API key for all requests and a session ID for account-related actions. Cache responses to respect rate limits (40 requests per 10 seconds). Verified to include all documented endpoints as of August 2025.

request.description: Create a guest session to perform actions like rating movies without a user account. Returns a guest_session_id.
Create a request token for user authentication. Redirect user to approve at https://www.themoviedb.org/authenticate/{request_token}.
Create a session ID after user approves the request token. Returns a session_id.
Validate a request token with user credentials. Use before creating a session.
Delete a session to log out a user.
Get account details for the authenticated user. Requires a session_id.
Get favorite movies for an account. Requires a session_id and account_id.
Get favorite TV shows for an account. Requires a session_id and account_id.
Add or remove a movie or TV show from favorites. Requires a session_id and account_id.
Get movies rated by the account. Requires a session_id and account_id.
Get TV shows rated by the account. Requires a session_id and account_id.
Get TV episodes rated by the account. Requires a session_id and account_id.
Get movies in the account's watchlist. Requires a session_id and account_id.
Get TV shows in the account's watchlist. Requires a session_id and account_id.
Add or remove a movie or TV show from the watchlist. Requires a session_id and account_id.
Get details for a movie by ID, including title, plot, genres. Use append_to_response to include related data.
Get account states (favorite, watchlist, rated) for a movie. Requires a session_id.
Get alternative titles for a specific movie.
Get cast and crew credits for a specific movie.
Get external IDs (e.g., IMDb, Facebook) for a specific movie.
Get images (posters, backdrops) for a specific movie.
Get keywords associated with a specific movie.
Get recommended movies based on a specific movie.
Get similar movies based on a specific movie.
Get user reviews for a specific movie.
Get lists that include a specific movie.
Rate a movie. Requires a session_id. Value must be between 0.5 and 10.0.
Delete a movie rating. Requires a session_id.
Get the most recently added movie.
Get movies currently playing in theaters.
Get currently popular movies.
Get top-rated movies.
Get upcoming movies.

variable.description: TV show ID (e.g., 1399 for Game of Thrones)

request.description: Get details for a TV show by ID.
Get account states (favorite, watchlist, rated) for a TV show. Requires a session_id.
Get alternative titles for a specific TV show.
Get cast and crew credits for a specific TV show.
Get external IDs for a specific TV show.
Get images (posters, backdrops) for a specific TV show.
Get keywords associated with a specific TV show.
Get recommended TV shows based on a specific TV show.
Get similar TV shows based on a specific TV show.
Get videos (trailers, teasers) for a specific TV show.
Rate a TV show. Requires a session_id. Value must be between 0.5 and 10.0.
Delete a TV show rating. Requires a session_id.
Get TV shows airing today.
Get TV shows currently on the air.
Get currently popular TV shows.
Get top-rated TV shows.
Get details for a specific TV show season.
Get account states (rated) for a TV season. Requires a session_id.
Get cast and crew credits for a specific TV season.
Get external IDs for a specific TV season.
